title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 26, 2019
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Mar 26, 2019 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Educational Games
items.content_text:
### Art & Design

*   [The Boolean Game](https://boolean.method.ac/) - Learn how to use boolean operations in Sketch, Figma, and other vector editors.
items.content_html:
Art & Design

  • The Boolean Game - Learn how to use boolean operations in Sketch, Figma, and other vector editors.

items.title: Awesome Cpp
items.content_text:
### Networking

*   [WAFer (⭐693)](https://github.com/riolet/WAFer) - A C language-based ultra-light software platform for scalable server-side and networking applications. Think node.js for C programmers. \[GPL2]

### Reflection

*   [Better Enums (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/aantron/better-enums) - Reflective enums (to string, iteration). Single header. \[BSD] [website](http://aantron.github.io/better-enums/)
*   [CPP-Reflection (⭐693)](https://github.com/AustinBrunkhorst/CPP-Reflection) - C++ Reflection using clang. \[MIT]
*   [Ponder (⭐661)](https://github.com/billyquith/ponder) - A C++11 library for reflection. \[MIT]
*   [RTTR (⭐3.3k)](https://github.com/rttrorg/rttr) - A C++11 library for reflection. \[MIT] [website](http://www.rttr.org)

### Static Code Analysis

*   [List of tools for static code analysis](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tools_for_static_code_analysis#C.2FC.2B.2B) - A list of tools for static code analysis from Wikipedia.
items.content_html:
Networking

  • WAFer (⭐693) - A C language-based ultra-light software platform for scalable server-side and networking applications. Think node.js for C programmers. [GPL2]

Reflection

  • Better Enums (⭐1.8k) - Reflective enums (to string, iteration). Single header. [BSD] website
  • CPP-Reflection (⭐693) - C++ Reflection using clang. [MIT]
  • Ponder (⭐661) - A C++11 library for reflection. [MIT]
  • RTTR (⭐3.3k) - A C++11 library for reflection. [MIT] website

Static Code Analysis

  • List of tools for static code analysis - A list of tools for static code analysis from Wikipedia.

items.title: Game Datasets
items.content_text:
### API

*   [Steam Spy](https://github.com/topics/steamspy) - Game statistical from Steam users profiles.
items.content_html:
API

  • Steam Spy - Game statistical from Steam users profiles.

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Development

- API: [CountAPI](https://countapi.xyz)

  Description: Free and simple counting service. You can use it to track page hits and specific events

  Auth: No

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes
items.content_html:
Development

  • API: CountAPI

    Description: Free and simple counting service. You can use it to track page hits and specific events

    Auth: No

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Yes

items.title: Awesome Static Website Services
items.content_text:
### Video

*   [Mux](https://mux.com/) - Paid - An API to play videos directly to the client. Can also power live streams.
items.content_html:
Video

  • Mux - Paid - An API to play videos directly to the client. Can also power live streams.

items.title: Awesome C
items.content_text:
### Build Systems

*   [Qbs](https://doc.qt.io/qbs/) - Modern build tool for software projects. [`LGPL3`](https://code.qt.io/cgit/qbs/qbs.git/tree/LICENSE.LGPLv3)
*   [xmake](https://xmake.io/) - Cross-platform build utility based on lua. [`Apache 2.0`](https://github.com/xmake-io/xmake/blob/master/LICENSE.md)

### Beginner / Language Standards

*   [Tutorial on pointers](http://www.cs.ucsb.edu/~mikec/cs16/misc/ptrtut12/index.htm)

### Intermediate / Language Standards

*   [What a C programmer should know about memory](https://marek.vavrusa.com/memory/)

### Self-study courses / Language Standards

*   [C Programming Language Certified Associate preparation course](https://cppinstitute.com/study-resources)

### String Manipulation / Language Standards

*   [utf8.h (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/sheredom/utf8.h) - Single header utf8 string functions. [`Unlicense`](https://unlicense.org/)

### Utilities / Language Standards

*   [libPhenom (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/facebookarchive/libphenom) - Deprecated, here for archival purposes. Eventing framework for building high-scalability and high-performance systems. [`Apache 2.0`](https://directory.fsf.org/wiki/License:Apache-2.0)
*   [rabbitmq-c (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/alanxz/rabbitmq-c) - Client library for [RabbitMQ](https://www.rabbitmq.com/). [`Expat`](https://directory.fsf.org/wiki/License:Expat)
*   [alsa-lib](https://www.alsa-project.org/main/index.php/Main_Page) - Userspace library to interact with ALSA. [`LGPL2.1`](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/lgpl-2.1.en.html)

### XML / Language Standards

*   [mini-xml (⭐477)](https://github.com/michaelrsweet/mxml) - Small XML reading and writing library. No dependencies aside from C standard library. [`Apache 2.0 with exceptions`](https://github.com/michaelrsweet/mxml/blob/master/LICENSE)
items.content_html:
Build Systems

  • Qbs - Modern build tool for software projects. LGPL3
  • xmake - Cross-platform build utility based on lua. Apache 2.0

Beginner / Language Standards

  • Tutorial on pointers

Intermediate / Language Standards

  • What a C programmer should know about memory

Self-study courses / Language Standards

  • C Programming Language Certified Associate preparation course

String Manipulation / Language Standards

  • utf8.h (⭐1.9k) - Single header utf8 string functions. Unlicense

Utilities / Language Standards

  • libPhenom (⭐1.7k) - Deprecated, here for archival purposes. Eventing framework for building high-scalability and high-performance systems. Apache 2.0
  • rabbitmq-c (⭐1.8k) - Client library for RabbitMQ. Expat
  • alsa-lib - Userspace library to interact with ALSA. LGPL2.1

XML / Language Standards

  • mini-xml (⭐477) - Small XML reading and writing library. No dependencies aside from C standard library. Apache 2.0 with exceptions
